definition: one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
improbable/unlikely/will not (act, happen etc)/not able/not having learned to do sth/(coll.) (Tw) don't mention it/not at all
not only (this one)/not just (...) but also

sentences.english: Life won't always turn out the way you want.
sentences.chinese: 生活并不总会如你所愿。

sentences.english: Partners are less likely to feel ignored or disrespected.
sentences.chinese: 同伴也不容易感到被忽视或者不受尊重。

sentences.english: Partners are less likely to feel ignored or disrespected.
sentences.chinese: 同伴也不容易感到被忽视或者不受尊重。

sentences.english: They're less likely to nitpick about details that aren't relevant at this stage.
sentences.chinese: 减少他们在与主题不相关的细节上的吹毛求疵。

sentences.english: I think he lives at No. 23 West Street, but I'm not sure about the number.
sentences.chinese: 我想他住在西大街23号，但是我对号码不确定。

sentences.english: We'll be late for the meeting if we stay any longer.
sentences.chinese: 再不走我们开会就要迟到了。

sentences.english: Unlike those of the West, Chinese loans are "no strings attached."
sentences.chinese: 不象西方国家，中国的贷款是“无附带条件”。

sentences.english: Newton's law is not applicable to any case.
sentences.chinese: 牛顿定律并不适合于任何情况。

sentences.english: Wash grapes overnight after don't hire small fly.
sentences.chinese: 洗葡萄隔夜后不招小飞虫。

sentences.english: In those days we did not need spies to watch the enemy's movement .
sentences.chinese: 在那些日子里，我们不需要情报员注意敌人动向。

sentences.english: And i have no idea how the hell you get the impressions that Okinawans are pro-Chinese.
sentences.chinese: 我不知道你怎么会有冲绳县民亲华的印象。

sentences.english: The line was going out fast but steadily and the fish was not panicked.
sentences.chinese: 钓索朝水中溜得既快又稳，阐明这鱼并不受惊。

sentences.english: According to Zhao, life in military campsites is not monotonous.
sentences.chinese: 赵峰表示，军营生活并不单调。

sentences.english: He felt browned off when he heard that he waw dismissed.
sentences.chinese: 当他听到自己被解职时感到很不痛快。

definition: haven't/hasn't/doesn't exist/to not have/to not be
improbable/unlikely/will not (act, happen etc)/not able/not having learned to do sth/(coll.) (Tw) don't mention it/not at all
like that/in that way/or so/so/so very much/about/in that case

at once/right away/only/just (emphasis)/as early as/already/as soon as/then/in that case/as many as/even if/to approach/to move towards/to undertake/to engage in/to suffer/subjected to/to accomplish/to take advantage of/to go with (of foods)/with regard to/concerning
again/once more/re-/second/another/then (after sth, and not until then)/no matter how ... (followed by an adjective or verb, and then (usually) 也[ye3] or 都[dou1] for emphasis)
important/vital/to want/to ask for/will/going to (as future auxiliary)/may/must/(used in a comparison) must be/probably/if
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
to think/to believe/to suppose/to wish/to want/to miss (feel wistful about the absence of sb or sth)
can/may/able to/to approve/to permit/to suit/(particle used for emphasis) certainly/very
